source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a computer-generated scenery shot of a fortified border area, likely representing the Berlin Wall. The camera pans along a dirt and grass strip situated between two high concrete walls. One side features anti-tank obstacles, while the other side reveals a long, curving outer wall with city buildings in the background.
